alert.note: Alert for Chase (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 12 at 11:32PM CST until December 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Chase County. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
